A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not only did I hate this movie for the crappy mess it was\, but I left the theater offended by VERY HEAVY-HANDED SJW PROPAGANDA PEPPERED THROUGH IT!!\n\nScrew you Disney.  I don't go to the movies to be lectured on social issues.  If I want to see that crap I'd turn on the news.
